import React, { useReducer } from 'react' const reducer = (state, action) => { if (action.type === "inputText") { const { name, value } = action.feild.target; return state = { ...state.inputController, [name]: value } console.log(state) } } const Contact = () => { const initialState = { inputController: { name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' } } const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState); const InputEventText = (e) => { dispatch({ type: 'inputText', feild: e }) } return ( <>
